cboCostEstimates.description: As Posted on the Website of the House Committee on Rules on July 25, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 2814, the Equal Access to Justice for Victims of Gun Violence Act of 2022

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 70 (Thursday, April 22, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SCHIFF:
H.R. 2814.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 3, the Commerce Clause and
Article I, Section 8, Clause 18, the Necessary and Proper
Clause. Additionally, the Preamble to the Constitution
provides support of the authority to enact legislation to
promote the General Welfare.
[Page H2109]

latestAction.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 340.

title: Equal Access to Justice for Victims of Gun Violence Act of 2022
